channel.title: [TUT] How To Ask MoparScape Question's
channel.description:
Ever Wonder How To Ask moparscape questions? this tut is to help you learn how!!!
First Make Your Way To [b]WWW.MOPARSCAPE.ORG/smf[/b] [img]http://img48.imageshack.us/img48/2962/moparscapeorgsmfoh1.gif[/img] To do this open your favorite web browser and in the url box type www.moparisthebest.com/smf then hit "Enter" (on your keyboard) or hit "GO" [img]http://img49.imageshack.us/img49/7789/urlboxzf8.gif[/img]
After you do this you succesfully made it to [b]WWW.MOPARSCAPE.ORG/smf[/b]!! and to this i say congratulations!
Now for the next step getting to the correct section of [b]WWW.MOPARSCAPE.ORG/smf[/b] your going to want to click "[b]MoparScape Questions"[/b] [img]http://img160.imageshack.us/img160/3386/moparscapeqay6.gif[/img]
now your going to want to look at sorta the top of the page and find a toolbar type thingy that looks like this [img]http://img455.imageshack.us/img455/2609/barhitngygn3.gif[/img] click "New Topic" now use the picture below [img]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/6171/messagejx0.gif[/img]
[size=12pt]Now Click[/size] [img]http://img127.imageshack.us/img127/4658/postpf5.gif[/img] [size=12pt]Not[/size] [img]http://img83.imageshack.us/img83/1808/previewms5.gif[/img] [size=12pt]But[/size] [img]http://img127.imageshack.us/img127/4658/postpf5.gif[/img]
[center][glow=red,2,300]MADE BY MVP566//DYLAN//RS2ARMOR.ORG[/glow][/center]
ps: i dident know where to post this here or in tuts area i decided here sonce it wouldent do much good there

item.title: [TUT] How To Ask MoparScape Question's
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

[quote=“Weibs, post:3, topic:25068”]And www.moparisthebest.com takes them to the webclient, which takes a while to load ( At least on my computer ) which would probably make them impatient and come back here flooding this thread with questions on why the forums didn’t come up. So, you might wanna change the www.moparisthebest.com to www.moparisthebest.com/smf , Just in case. :)[/quote] It loads fairly quickly for me

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT] How To Ask MoparScape Question's

item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

Ever Wonder How To Ask moparscape questions? this tut is to help you learn how!!!

First Make Your Way To WWW.MOPARSCAPE.ORG/smf

To do this open your favorite web browser and in the url box type www.moparisthebest.com/smf then hit “Enter” (on your keyboard) or hit “GO”

After you do this you succesfully made it to WWW.MOPARSCAPE.ORG/smf!! and to this i say congratulations!

Now for the next step getting to the correct section of WWW.MOPARSCAPE.ORG/smf your going to want to click "MoparScape Questions"

now your going to want to look at sorta the top of the page and find a toolbar type thingy that looks like this
click “New Topic” now use the picture below
